title: Annual deficits add to national debt

content.question: Which of the following is true about a country’s national debt?

choices.label: It is the sum of the country’s trade deficit and government budget deficit.
It increases when gross domestic product increases.
It increases when the country’s government has a budget deficit.
It decreases when the country’s exports exceed its imports.
It decreases when national savings decrease.

content.answer: It increases when the country’s government has a budget deficit.

topic.text: 5.4: Government Deficits and the National Debt
